(function() {
var siteProperties = window.DDC.siteProperties,
camelCase;
for (var prop in siteProperties) {
// convert underscores to camelCase
if(prop.indexOf('_') >= 0) {
camelCase = prop.replace(/_([a-z])/g, function (g) { return g[1].toUpperCase() });
siteProperties[camelCase] = siteProperties[prop];
delete siteProperties[prop];
}
};
})();
window.DDC.getSiteProperties = function () {
return window.DDC.siteProperties;
};

var propValue;
if (propName in window.DDC.siteProperties) {
propValue = window.DDC.siteProperties[propName];
}
return propValue;

<img src=""<%= data.item.attributes.imageUri %><% if(data.item.attributes.imageUri.includes('dealer.com')) { %>?impolicy=resize_crop&w=146&h=110<% } %>""/>
</a>
<div class=""view-date"">
Alerted
<span class=""timeago"" title=""<%= data.computed.time %>""><%= data.computed.time %></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class=""vehicle-details"">
<div class=""vehicle-title"">
<a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">
<%= data.item.attributes.year %> <%= data.item.attributes.make %> <%= data.item.attributes.model %> <%= data.item.attributes.trim %>
</a>
</div>
<% if (data.item.attributes.status == 5) { %>
<span class=""price sold"">SOLD</span>
<% } else { %>					
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""price"">
<% if (data.computed.price) { %>
<%= data.computed.price %>
<% } else { %>
Call For Pricing
<% } %>
</div>
<% } %>
<% } %>
<div class=""incentive-cta"">
<div class=""incentive-count""><%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount %> 
<% if( data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount > 1 ) { %> New Offers <% } else { %> New Offer <% } %>
</div>
<a href=""#"" class=""dialog"" data-href=""/global-incentives/request-form.htm?vehicleId=<%= data.item.itemUUID %>&amp;selectedIncentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;itemType=<%= data.item.attributes.condition %>&amp;useGlobalVehicleIdMatch=true&amp;incentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;selectedAccountId=<%= data.item.itemAccountId %>&amp;globalVehicleTrimId=<%= data.item.attributes.globalVehicleTrimId %>"" data-width=""800"" data-close-all=""true"" data-title=""Request More Info"">
<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].shortTitle %></a>
</div>
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""cta"">
<% if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %>							
<% } %>
</div>
<% } else { 
if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %> 
<div class=""offsite""><a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">View at <%= data.item.dealershipName %></a></div>
<% }
} %>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</script>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div id=""dealernotes1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-name=""ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-id=""dealernotes1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">Dealer Notes</h3><div class=""content""><p> Boasts 42 Highway MPG and 33 City MPG! This Honda Civic Sedan delivers a Intercooled Turbo Premium Unleaded I-4 1.5 L/91 engine powering this Variable transmission. RALLYE RED, Wheels: 17"" Alloy w/Gloss Black Inserts, Variable Intermittent Wipers. <p><strong>This Honda Civic Sedan Comes Equipped with These Options </strong><br /> Trunk Rear Cargo Access, Trip Computer, Transmission: Continuously Variable (LL-CVT), Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode, Traffic Jam Assist, Tires: 215/50R17 91H AS, Strut Front Suspension w/Coil Springs, Steel Spare Wheel, Side Impact Beams, Seats w/Cloth Back Material. </p> <p><strong> Stop By Today </strong><br> Come in for a quick visit at Nardy Honda, 559 Middle Country Rd, Saint James, NY 11780 to claim your Honda Civic Sedan!</p></div></div>
<div id=""kbb-reviews1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-name=""ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-id=""kbb-reviews1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">KBB.com Consumer Reviews</h3><div><div class=""kbb-header d-flex align-items-center""><div class=""kbb-logo-container""><img src=""https://static.dealer.com/global/media/logos/kbb/horizontal/light/180x102.png"" alt=""Kelley Blue Book - KBB.com""/></div><div class=""kbb-ratings ml-auto""><div class=""bg-contrast-med border ddc-font-size-small text-center py-1 px-3""><span class=""text-muted"">Overall</span><strong class=""ddc-font-size-xxlarge d-block font-weight-bold"">4.1</strong><span class=""text-muted"">Out of <!-- -->5</span></div></div></div><div class=""kbb-reviews mt-3""><ul class=""list-unstyled""><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Civic EXL</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->CivEXL</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Wednesday, February 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">4.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Fun to drive and fuel efficient car. CVT numbs the driving a lot but is a trade off for the increased fuel economy. Seating is decent, but could definitely use some more lumbar support to make it better.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Poor Man&#x27;s Bugatti</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Greg</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Sunday, January 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">5.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Got the 2022 Honda Civic EX-L.  Added back spoiler, side molding, custom car seat covers, leather steering wheel cover, tinted windows, and window visors. The car looks fantastic, has 180 horsepower, and gets excellent gas mileage.  At the end of the day, only time will tell how reliable it turns out to be, but with regular maintenance, I expect the car to last a long time. The car feels a lot more expensive than it is and the ride is smooth. I have no complaints at all about it. If anything, I think it has too many so-called safety features, most of which I disable. I hate lane assist because it feels like the car is fighting me when I go to change lanes. Also, I don&#x27;t like the Auto Idle Stop, but there is a button to easily disable it.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Dashboard rattles!</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Jeff</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Saturday, September 24, 2022</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">1.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>I bought this civic lx 2022 four months ago. Now I can hear annoying rattling sound almost from every parts of the dashboard, which is driving me crazy.  I hate to say that the quality is far from its older version.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li></ul></div><div class=""kbb-footer mt-3""><span><span class=""kbb-footer-text text-muted"">Based on <!-- -->29<!-- --> consumer ratings for<!-- --> <!-- -->2022–2023<!-- --> models.</span><span class=""text-muted separator "" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span></span><a class=""kbb-privacy-link"" target=""_blank"" rel=""noopener noreferrer"" href=""https://www.kbb.com/company/privacy-policy/"">Privacy<!-- --> </a></div></div></div>

<script type=""application/javascript"">
// Publish instantEprice to DR3/Accelerate iframe
document.addEventListener(""DOMContentLoaded"", function() {
if (window.DDC && window.DDC.pubsub && window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe) {
window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe('instant-eprice.show', function (data) {
if (data.yourEPrice !== 'PLEASE_CALL') {
var re = new RegExp('^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+)');
var mmdFrame = document.getElementById('mmd-frame-frame2');
// null check
if (mmdFrame && mmdFrame.src && mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]) {
mmdFrame.contentWindow.postMessage({""eprice"": Number(data.yourEPrice.replace(/[^0-9\.]+/g,""""))}, mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]);
}
}
});
}
});
</script>

<div  class="" ddc-content tracking-ddc-data-layer""  data-widget-name=""tracking-ddc-data-layer"" data-widget-id=""template-tracking13"">
<script type=""text/javascript"">

var stripNullStrings = function(obj){
for (var property in obj) {
if (obj.hasOwnProperty(property)) {
var val = obj[property];
if (typeof val === ""object"") {
stripNullStrings(val);
} else {
var checkdVal = ((val === ""null"")||(val === """" ) ? null : val);
obj[property] = checkdVal;
}
}
}
}

})(window.DDC);

<script type=""text/javascript"">

var generateCallTrackingSessionId = function() {
var uuid = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2) + (new Date()).getTime().toString(36);
return uuid;
},
setCallTrackingSessionCookie = function(uuid) {
// Set cookie to expire in 2 hours
var expirationTime = new Date();
expirationTime.setTime(expirationTime.getTime() + 120 * 60 * 1000);
document.cookie = 'callTrackingSessionId=' + uuid + ';expires=' + expirationTime.toGMTString() + ';path=/';
},
cookieRxResults = new RegExp(""callTrackingSessionId=\(\.\*\?\)\(;\|\$\)"").exec(document.cookie),
callTrackingSessionId
;
if (cookieRxResults) {
callTrackingSessionId = cookieRxResults[1];
} else {
callTrackingSessionId = generateCallTrackingSessionId();
setCallTrackingSessionCookie(callTrackingSessionId);
}
window.DDC.callTrackingSettings = {
callTrackingArtifactBaseUrl: 'https://phones.ddcplatform.dealer.com',
callTrackingSessionId: callTrackingSessionId,
callTrackingAccountIdsOverride: null
};
window.DDC.phonesUrl = 'https://phone-swapping-service-prod.us-west-2.web.dealer.com:443/phones';

if (typeof perfMetrics === ""object"") {
perfMetrics.onFirstInputDelay(function(delay, evt) {
if (!window.newrelic) { return; }

window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('firstInputType', evt.type);

$(document).ready(function() {
var newrelic = window.newrelic;
if (typeof newrelic === 'object') {
var cacheStatus = 'UNKNOWN';

var cdnCache;
var navEntries = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation');
if (navEntries.length > 0) {
if (navEntries[0].serverTiming) {
cdnCache = navEntries[0].serverTiming.find(entry => entry.name === 'cdn-cache');
if (cdnCache !== undefined) {
cacheStatus = cdnCache.description;
}
} else {
cacheStatus = 'UNSUPPORTED';
}
}
} catch (error) {
cacheStatus = 'ERROR';
console.error(error);
}
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('basePageCacheStatus', cacheStatus);

return Cookies.get(cookieName);
}

var cookieValue = getCookieValue(cookieName);
if(cookieValue) {
newrelic.setCustomAttribute(attrName, cookieValue);
if(removeCookie) {
Cookies.remove(cookieName)
}
}

""userRegion"": null,
""userTimezoneId"": null,

(async function() {
document.addEventListener('user-location-fetch-success', function () {
if (window.DDC.dataLayer?.user) {
window.DDC.dataLayer.user = { ...window.DDC.dataLayer.user, ...window.DDC.userLocation };
}
}, { once: true });
try {
// Check for userLocation Data in the cache
var userLocationData = sessionStorage.getItem('session.location');
if(userLocationData === null){
const fetchedUserLocation = await fetch('/api/user-location/geolocation')
.then((res) => res.json())
.then((json) => Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(json).map(([k, v]) => [k, v === null ? v : String(v)])
));
window.DDC.userLocation = {
...window.DDC.userLocation,
...fetchedUserLocation,
userLocationFetchSuccess: true
};
// Cache userLocation Data
sessionStorage.setItem('session.location', JSON.stringify(window.DDC.userLocation));
// Overwrite DDC.PostalCode Cookie
if (window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode && $.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"") !== window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode) {
$.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"", window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode, { path : '/' });
}
document.dispatchEvent(new Event('user-location-fetch-success'));
}
else {
window.DDC.userLocation = JSON.parse(userLocationData); 
}
} catch (error) {
if (window.newrelic) {
window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('userLocationFetchError', error);
}
}
})();

(function() {
var siteProperties = window.DDC.siteProperties,
camelCase;
for (var prop in siteProperties) {
// convert underscores to camelCase
if(prop.indexOf('_') >= 0) {
camelCase = prop.replace(/_([a-z])/g, function (g) { return g[1].toUpperCase() });
siteProperties[camelCase] = siteProperties[prop];
delete siteProperties[prop];
}
};
})();
window.DDC.getSiteProperties = function () {
return window.DDC.siteProperties;
};

var propValue;
if (propName in window.DDC.siteProperties) {
propValue = window.DDC.siteProperties[propName];
}
return propValue;

<img src=""<%= data.item.attributes.imageUri %><% if(data.item.attributes.imageUri.includes('dealer.com')) { %>?impolicy=resize_crop&w=146&h=110<% } %>""/>
</a>
<div class=""view-date"">
Alerted
<span class=""timeago"" title=""<%= data.computed.time %>""><%= data.computed.time %></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class=""vehicle-details"">
<div class=""vehicle-title"">
<a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">
<%= data.item.attributes.year %> <%= data.item.attributes.make %> <%= data.item.attributes.model %> <%= data.item.attributes.trim %>
</a>
</div>
<% if (data.item.attributes.status == 5) { %>
<span class=""price sold"">SOLD</span>
<% } else { %>					
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""price"">
<% if (data.computed.price) { %>
<%= data.computed.price %>
<% } else { %>
Call For Pricing
<% } %>
</div>
<% } %>
<% } %>
<div class=""incentive-cta"">
<div class=""incentive-count""><%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount %> 
<% if( data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount > 1 ) { %> New Offers <% } else { %> New Offer <% } %>
</div>
<a href=""#"" class=""dialog"" data-href=""/global-incentives/request-form.htm?vehicleId=<%= data.item.itemUUID %>&amp;selectedIncentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;itemType=<%= data.item.attributes.condition %>&amp;useGlobalVehicleIdMatch=true&amp;incentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;selectedAccountId=<%= data.item.itemAccountId %>&amp;globalVehicleTrimId=<%= data.item.attributes.globalVehicleTrimId %>"" data-width=""800"" data-close-all=""true"" data-title=""Request More Info"">
<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].shortTitle %></a>
</div>
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""cta"">
<% if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %>							
<% } %>
</div>
<% } else { 
if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %> 
<div class=""offsite""><a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">View at <%= data.item.dealershipName %></a></div>
<% }
} %>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</script>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div id=""dealernotes1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-name=""ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-id=""dealernotes1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">Dealer Notes</h3><div class=""content""><p> Boasts 39 Highway MPG and 31 City MPG! This Honda Civic Hatchback boasts a Intercooled Turbo Regular Unleaded I-4 1.5 L/91 engine powering this Variable transmission. SMOKEY MAUVE PEARL, Wheels: 17"" Alloy, Wheels w/Machined w/Painted Accents Accents. <p><strong>This Honda Civic Hatchback Comes Equipped with These Options </strong><br /> Vehicle Stability Assist (VSA) Electronic Stability Control (ESC), Variable Intermittent Wipers, Trip Computer, Transmission: Continuously Variable -inc: LED gear position indicators, Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode, Traffic Jam Assist, Tires: 215/50R17 91H AS, Tailgate/Rear Door Lock Included w/Power Door Locks, Strut Front Suspension w/Coil Springs, Steel Spare Wheel. </p> <p><strong> Stop By Today </strong><br> Stop by Nardy Honda located at 559 Middle Country Rd, Saint James, NY 11780 for a quick visit and a great vehicle!</p></div></div>
<div id=""kbb-reviews1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-name=""ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-id=""kbb-reviews1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">KBB.com Consumer Reviews</h3><div><div class=""kbb-header d-flex align-items-center""><div class=""kbb-logo-container""><img src=""https://static.dealer.com/global/media/logos/kbb/horizontal/light/180x102.png"" alt=""Kelley Blue Book - KBB.com""/></div><div class=""kbb-ratings ml-auto""><div class=""bg-contrast-med border ddc-font-size-small text-center py-1 px-3""><span class=""text-muted"">Overall</span><strong class=""ddc-font-size-xxlarge d-block font-weight-bold"">4.1</strong><span class=""text-muted"">Out of <!-- -->5</span></div></div></div><div class=""kbb-reviews mt-3""><ul class=""list-unstyled""><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Civic EXL</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->CivEXL</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Wednesday, February 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">4.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Fun to drive and fuel efficient car. CVT numbs the driving a lot but is a trade off for the increased fuel economy. Seating is decent, but could definitely use some more lumbar support to make it better.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Poor Man&#x27;s Bugatti</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Greg</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Sunday, January 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">5.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Got the 2022 Honda Civic EX-L.  Added back spoiler, side molding, custom car seat covers, leather steering wheel cover, tinted windows, and window visors. The car looks fantastic, has 180 horsepower, and gets excellent gas mileage.  At the end of the day, only time will tell how reliable it turns out to be, but with regular maintenance, I expect the car to last a long time. The car feels a lot more expensive than it is and the ride is smooth. I have no complaints at all about it. If anything, I think it has too many so-called safety features, most of which I disable. I hate lane assist because it feels like the car is fighting me when I go to change lanes. Also, I don&#x27;t like the Auto Idle Stop, but there is a button to easily disable it.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Dashboard rattles!</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Jeff</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Saturday, September 24, 2022</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">1.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>I bought this civic lx 2022 four months ago. Now I can hear annoying rattling sound almost from every parts of the dashboard, which is driving me crazy.  I hate to say that the quality is far from its older version.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li></ul></div><div class=""kbb-footer mt-3""><span><span class=""kbb-footer-text text-muted"">Based on <!-- -->29<!-- --> consumer ratings for<!-- --> <!-- -->2022–2023<!-- --> models.</span><span class=""text-muted separator "" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span></span><a class=""kbb-privacy-link"" target=""_blank"" rel=""noopener noreferrer"" href=""https://www.kbb.com/company/privacy-policy/"">Privacy<!-- --> </a></div></div></div>

<script type=""application/javascript"">
// Publish instantEprice to DR3/Accelerate iframe
document.addEventListener(""DOMContentLoaded"", function() {
if (window.DDC && window.DDC.pubsub && window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe) {
window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe('instant-eprice.show', function (data) {
if (data.yourEPrice !== 'PLEASE_CALL') {
var re = new RegExp('^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+)');
var mmdFrame = document.getElementById('mmd-frame-frame2');
// null check
if (mmdFrame && mmdFrame.src && mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]) {
mmdFrame.contentWindow.postMessage({""eprice"": Number(data.yourEPrice.replace(/[^0-9\.]+/g,""""))}, mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]);
}
}
});
}
});
</script>

<div  class="" ddc-content tracking-ddc-data-layer""  data-widget-name=""tracking-ddc-data-layer"" data-widget-id=""template-tracking13"">
<script type=""text/javascript"">

// this takes in the object and returns all string null as object null
var stripNullStrings = function(obj){
for (var property in obj) {
if (obj.hasOwnProperty(property)) {
var val = obj[property];
if (typeof val === ""object"") {
stripNullStrings(val);
} else {
var checkdVal = ((val === ""null"")||(val === """" ) ? null : val);
obj[property] = checkdVal;
}
}
}
}
stripNullStrings(DDC.dataLayer);
})(window.DDC);

var generateCallTrackingSessionId = function() {
var uuid = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2) + (new Date()).getTime().toString(36);
return uuid;
},
setCallTrackingSessionCookie = function(uuid) {
// Set cookie to expire in 2 hours
var expirationTime = new Date();
expirationTime.setTime(expirationTime.getTime() + 120 * 60 * 1000);
document.cookie = 'callTrackingSessionId=' + uuid + ';expires=' + expirationTime.toGMTString() + ';path=/';
},
cookieRxResults = new RegExp(""callTrackingSessionId=\(\.\*\?\)\(;\|\$\)"").exec(document.cookie),
callTrackingSessionId
;
if (cookieRxResults) {
callTrackingSessionId = cookieRxResults[1];
} else {
callTrackingSessionId = generateCallTrackingSessionId();
setCallTrackingSessionCookie(callTrackingSessionId);
}
window.DDC.callTrackingSettings = {
callTrackingArtifactBaseUrl: 'https://phones.ddcplatform.dealer.com',
callTrackingSessionId: callTrackingSessionId,
callTrackingAccountIdsOverride: null
};

""userRegion"": null,
""userTimezoneId"": null,
""userAreaCode"": null,

(async function() {
document.addEventListener('user-location-fetch-success', function () {
if (window.DDC.dataLayer?.user) {
window.DDC.dataLayer.user = { ...window.DDC.dataLayer.user, ...window.DDC.userLocation };
}
}, { once: true });
try {
// Check for userLocation Data in the cache
var userLocationData = sessionStorage.getItem('session.location');
if(userLocationData === null){
const fetchedUserLocation = await fetch('/api/user-location/geolocation')
.then((res) => res.json())
.then((json) => Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(json).map(([k, v]) => [k, v === null ? v : String(v)])
));
window.DDC.userLocation = {
...window.DDC.userLocation,
...fetchedUserLocation,
userLocationFetchSuccess: true
};
// Cache userLocation Data
sessionStorage.setItem('session.location', JSON.stringify(window.DDC.userLocation));
// Overwrite DDC.PostalCode Cookie
if (window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode && $.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"") !== window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode) {
$.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"", window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode, { path : '/' });
}
document.dispatchEvent(new Event('user-location-fetch-success'));
}
else {
window.DDC.userLocation = JSON.parse(userLocationData); 
}
} catch (error) {
if (window.newrelic) {
window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('userLocationFetchError', error);
}
}
})();

(function() {
var siteProperties = window.DDC.siteProperties,
camelCase;
for (var prop in siteProperties) {
// convert underscores to camelCase
if(prop.indexOf('_') >= 0) {
camelCase = prop.replace(/_([a-z])/g, function (g) { return g[1].toUpperCase() });
siteProperties[camelCase] = siteProperties[prop];
delete siteProperties[prop];
}
};
})();
window.DDC.getSiteProperties = function () {
return window.DDC.siteProperties;
};

var propValue;
if (propName in window.DDC.siteProperties) {
propValue = window.DDC.siteProperties[propName];
}
return propValue;

<img src=""<%= data.item.attributes.imageUri %><% if(data.item.attributes.imageUri.includes('dealer.com')) { %>?impolicy=resize_crop&w=146&h=110<% } %>""/>
</a>
<div class=""view-date"">
Alerted
<span class=""timeago"" title=""<%= data.computed.time %>""><%= data.computed.time %></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class=""vehicle-details"">
<div class=""vehicle-title"">
<a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">
<%= data.item.attributes.year %> <%= data.item.attributes.make %> <%= data.item.attributes.model %> <%= data.item.attributes.trim %>
</a>
</div>
<% if (data.item.attributes.status == 5) { %>
<span class=""price sold"">SOLD</span>
<% } else { %>					
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""price"">
<% if (data.computed.price) { %>
<%= data.computed.price %>
<% } else { %>
Call For Pricing
<% } %>
</div>
<% } %>
<% } %>
<div class=""incentive-cta"">
<div class=""incentive-count""><%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount %> 
<% if( data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount > 1 ) { %> New Offers <% } else { %> New Offer <% } %>
</div>
<a href=""#"" class=""dialog"" data-href=""/global-incentives/request-form.htm?vehicleId=<%= data.item.itemUUID %>&amp;selectedIncentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;itemType=<%= data.item.attributes.condition %>&amp;useGlobalVehicleIdMatch=true&amp;incentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;selectedAccountId=<%= data.item.itemAccountId %>&amp;globalVehicleTrimId=<%= data.item.attributes.globalVehicleTrimId %>"" data-width=""800"" data-close-all=""true"" data-title=""Request More Info"">
<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].shortTitle %></a>
</div>
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""cta"">
<% if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %>							
<% } %>
</div>
<% } else { 
if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %> 
<div class=""offsite""><a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">View at <%= data.item.dealershipName %></a></div>
<% }
} %>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</script>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div id=""dealernotes1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-name=""ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-id=""dealernotes1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">Dealer Notes</h3><div class=""content""><p> Scores 39 Highway MPG and 31 City MPG! This Honda Civic Hatchback boasts a Intercooled Turbo Regular Unleaded I-4 1.5 L/91 engine powering this Variable transmission. METEORITE GRAY METALLIC, Wheels: 17"" Alloy, Wheels w/Machined w/Painted Accents Accents. <p><strong> This Honda Civic Hatchback Features the Following Options </strong><br /> Vehicle Stability Assist (VSA) Electronic Stability Control (ESC), Variable Intermittent Wipers, Trip Computer, Transmission: Continuously Variable -inc: LED gear position indicators, Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode, Traffic Jam Assist, Tires: 215/50R17 91H AS, Tailgate/Rear Door Lock Included w/Power Door Locks, Strut Front Suspension w/Coil Springs, Steel Spare Wheel. </p> <p><strong> Visit Us Today </strong><br> Test drive this must-see, must-drive, must-own beauty today at Nardy Honda, 559 Middle Country Rd, Saint James, NY 11780.</p></div></div>
<div id=""kbb-reviews1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-name=""ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-id=""kbb-reviews1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">KBB.com Consumer Reviews</h3><div><div class=""kbb-header d-flex align-items-center""><div class=""kbb-logo-container""><img src=""https://static.dealer.com/global/media/logos/kbb/horizontal/light/180x102.png"" alt=""Kelley Blue Book - KBB.com""/></div><div class=""kbb-ratings ml-auto""><div class=""bg-contrast-med border ddc-font-size-small text-center py-1 px-3""><span class=""text-muted"">Overall</span><strong class=""ddc-font-size-xxlarge d-block font-weight-bold"">4.1</strong><span class=""text-muted"">Out of <!-- -->5</span></div></div></div><div class=""kbb-reviews mt-3""><ul class=""list-unstyled""><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Civic EXL</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->CivEXL</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Wednesday, February 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">4.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Fun to drive and fuel efficient car. CVT numbs the driving a lot but is a trade off for the increased fuel economy. Seating is decent, but could definitely use some more lumbar support to make it better.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Poor Man&#x27;s Bugatti</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Greg</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Sunday, January 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">5.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Got the 2022 Honda Civic EX-L.  Added back spoiler, side molding, custom car seat covers, leather steering wheel cover, tinted windows, and window visors. The car looks fantastic, has 180 horsepower, and gets excellent gas mileage.  At the end of the day, only time will tell how reliable it turns out to be, but with regular maintenance, I expect the car to last a long time. The car feels a lot more expensive than it is and the ride is smooth. I have no complaints at all about it. If anything, I think it has too many so-called safety features, most of which I disable. I hate lane assist because it feels like the car is fighting me when I go to change lanes. Also, I don&#x27;t like the Auto Idle Stop, but there is a button to easily disable it.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Dashboard rattles!</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Jeff</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Saturday, September 24, 2022</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">1.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>I bought this civic lx 2022 four months ago. Now I can hear annoying rattling sound almost from every parts of the dashboard, which is driving me crazy.  I hate to say that the quality is far from its older version.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li></ul></div><div class=""kbb-footer mt-3""><span><span class=""kbb-footer-text text-muted"">Based on <!-- -->29<!-- --> consumer ratings for<!-- --> <!-- -->2022–2023<!-- --> models.</span><span class=""text-muted separator "" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span></span><a class=""kbb-privacy-link"" target=""_blank"" rel=""noopener noreferrer"" href=""https://www.kbb.com/company/privacy-policy/"">Privacy<!-- --> </a></div></div></div>

<script type=""application/javascript"">
// Publish instantEprice to DR3/Accelerate iframe
document.addEventListener(""DOMContentLoaded"", function() {
if (window.DDC && window.DDC.pubsub && window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe) {
window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe('instant-eprice.show', function (data) {
if (data.yourEPrice !== 'PLEASE_CALL') {
var re = new RegExp('^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+)');
var mmdFrame = document.getElementById('mmd-frame-frame2');
// null check
if (mmdFrame && mmdFrame.src && mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]) {
mmdFrame.contentWindow.postMessage({""eprice"": Number(data.yourEPrice.replace(/[^0-9\.]+/g,""""))}, mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]);
}
}
});
}
});
</script>

<div  class="" ddc-content tracking-ddc-data-layer""  data-widget-name=""tracking-ddc-data-layer"" data-widget-id=""template-tracking13"">
<script type=""text/javascript"">

var stripNullStrings = function(obj){
for (var property in obj) {
if (obj.hasOwnProperty(property)) {
var val = obj[property];
if (typeof val === ""object"") {
stripNullStrings(val);
} else {
var checkdVal = ((val === ""null"")||(val === """" ) ? null : val);
obj[property] = checkdVal;
}
}
}
}
stripNullStrings(DDC.dataLayer);
})(window.DDC);

var generateCallTrackingSessionId = function() {
var uuid = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2) + (new Date()).getTime().toString(36);
return uuid;
},
setCallTrackingSessionCookie = function(uuid) {
// Set cookie to expire in 2 hours
var expirationTime = new Date();
expirationTime.setTime(expirationTime.getTime() + 120 * 60 * 1000);
document.cookie = 'callTrackingSessionId=' + uuid + ';expires=' + expirationTime.toGMTString() + ';path=/';
},
cookieRxResults = new RegExp(""callTrackingSessionId=\(\.\*\?\)\(;\|\$\)"").exec(document.cookie),
callTrackingSessionId
;
if (cookieRxResults) {
callTrackingSessionId = cookieRxResults[1];
} else {
callTrackingSessionId = generateCallTrackingSessionId();
setCallTrackingSessionCookie(callTrackingSessionId);
}
window.DDC.callTrackingSettings = {
callTrackingArtifactBaseUrl: 'https://phones.ddcplatform.dealer.com',
callTrackingSessionId: callTrackingSessionId,
callTrackingAccountIdsOverride: null
};
window.DDC.phonesUrl = 'https://phone-swapping-service-prod.us-west-2.web.dealer.com:443/phones';

if (navEntries[0].serverTiming) {
cdnCache = navEntries[0].serverTiming.find(entry => entry.name === 'cdn-cache');
if (cdnCache !== undefined) {
cacheStatus = cdnCache.description;
}
} else {
cacheStatus = 'UNSUPPORTED';
}
}
} catch (error) {
cacheStatus = 'ERROR';
console.error(error);
}
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('basePageCacheStatus', cacheStatus);

return Cookies.get(cookieName);

if(cookieValue) {
newrelic.setCustomAttribute(attrName, cookieValue);
if(removeCookie) {
Cookies.remove(cookieName)
}
}

(async function() {
document.addEventListener('user-location-fetch-success', function () {
if (window.DDC.dataLayer?.user) {
window.DDC.dataLayer.user = { ...window.DDC.dataLayer.user, ...window.DDC.userLocation };
}
}, { once: true });
try {
// Check for userLocation Data in the cache
var userLocationData = sessionStorage.getItem('session.location');
if(userLocationData === null){
const fetchedUserLocation = await fetch('/api/user-location/geolocation')
.then((res) => res.json())
.then((json) => Object.fromEntries(Object.entries(json).map(([k, v]) => [k, v === null ? v : String(v)])
));
window.DDC.userLocation = {
...window.DDC.userLocation,
...fetchedUserLocation,
userLocationFetchSuccess: true
};
// Cache userLocation Data
sessionStorage.setItem('session.location', JSON.stringify(window.DDC.userLocation));
// Overwrite DDC.PostalCode Cookie
if (window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode && $.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"") !== window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode) {
$.cookie(""DDC.postalCode"", window.DDC.userLocation.userPostalCode, { path : '/' });
}
document.dispatchEvent(new Event('user-location-fetch-success'));
}
else {
window.DDC.userLocation = JSON.parse(userLocationData); 
}
} catch (error) {
if (window.newrelic) {
window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('userLocationFetchError', error);
}
}
})();

(function() {
var siteProperties = window.DDC.siteProperties,
camelCase;
for (var prop in siteProperties) {
// convert underscores to camelCase
if(prop.indexOf('_') >= 0) {
camelCase = prop.replace(/_([a-z])/g, function (g) { return g[1].toUpperCase() });
siteProperties[camelCase] = siteProperties[prop];
delete siteProperties[prop];
}
};
})();

return window.DDC.siteProperties;

var propValue;

propValue = window.DDC.siteProperties[propName];
}
return propValue;

<img src=""<%= data.item.attributes.imageUri %><% if(data.item.attributes.imageUri.includes('dealer.com')) { %>?impolicy=resize_crop&w=146&h=110<% } %>""/>
</a>
<div class=""view-date"">
Alerted
<span class=""timeago"" title=""<%= data.computed.time %>""><%= data.computed.time %></span>
</div>
</div>
<div class=""vehicle-details"">
<div class=""vehicle-title"">
<a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">
<%= data.item.attributes.year %> <%= data.item.attributes.make %> <%= data.item.attributes.model %> <%= data.item.attributes.trim %>
</a>
</div>
<% if (data.item.attributes.status == 5) { %>
<span class=""price sold"">SOLD</span>
<% } else { %>					
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""price"">
<% if (data.computed.price) { %>
<%= data.computed.price %>
<% } else { %>
Call For Pricing
<% } %>
</div>
<% } %>
<% } %>
<div class=""incentive-cta"">
<div class=""incentive-count""><%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount %> 
<% if( data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentivesCount > 1 ) { %> New Offers <% } else { %> New Offer <% } %>
</div>
<a href=""#"" class=""dialog"" data-href=""/global-incentives/request-form.htm?vehicleId=<%= data.item.itemUUID %>&amp;selectedIncentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;itemType=<%= data.item.attributes.condition %>&amp;useGlobalVehicleIdMatch=true&amp;incentiveId=<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].id %>&amp;selectedAccountId=<%= data.item.itemAccountId %>&amp;globalVehicleTrimId=<%= data.item.attributes.globalVehicleTrimId %>"" data-width=""800"" data-close-all=""true"" data-title=""Request More Info"">
<%= data.item.latestNotifications.NEW_INCENTIVES.activeIncentives[0].shortTitle %></a>
</div>
<% if( data.item.offsite != true) { %>
<div class=""cta"">
<% if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %>							
<% } %>
</div>
<% } else { 
if (data.item.attributes.status != 5) { %> 
<div class=""offsite""><a href=""<%= data.computed.vdpHref %>"">View at <%= data.item.dealershipName %></a></div>
<% }
} %>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</script>
</div>
</div>

</div>

<div id=""dealernotes1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-name=""ws-dealernotes"" data-widget-id=""dealernotes1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">Dealer Notes</h3><div class=""content""><p> Boasts 40 Highway MPG and 31 City MPG! This Honda Civic Sedan delivers a Regular Unleaded I-4 2.0 L/122 engine powering this Variable transmission. LUNAR SILVER METALLIC, Wheels: 16"" w/Full Covers, Wheels w/Full Wheel Covers. <p><strong> This Honda Civic Sedan Features the Following Options </strong><br /> Urethane Gear Shifter Material, Trunk Rear Cargo Access, Trip Computer, Transmission: Continuously Variable (M-CVT), Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode, Traffic Jam Assist, Tires: 215/55R16 93H AS, Strut Front Suspension w/Coil Springs, Steel Spare Wheel, Single Stainless Steel Exhaust. </p> <p><strong> Stop By Today </strong><br> Stop by Nardy Honda located at 559 Middle Country Rd, Saint James, NY 11780 for a quick visit and a great vehicle!</p></div></div>
<div id=""kbb-reviews1-app-root"" class=""ddc-content ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-name=""ws-kbb-reviews"" data-widget-id=""kbb-reviews1"" data-reactroot=""""><h3 class=""widget-heading h2"">KBB.com Consumer Reviews</h3><div><div class=""kbb-header d-flex align-items-center""><div class=""kbb-logo-container""><img src=""https://static.dealer.com/global/media/logos/kbb/horizontal/light/180x102.png"" alt=""Kelley Blue Book - KBB.com""/></div><div class=""kbb-ratings ml-auto""><div class=""bg-contrast-med border ddc-font-size-small text-center py-1 px-3""><span class=""text-muted"">Overall</span><strong class=""ddc-font-size-xxlarge d-block font-weight-bold"">4.1</strong><span class=""text-muted"">Out of <!-- -->5</span></div></div></div><div class=""kbb-reviews mt-3""><ul class=""list-unstyled""><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Civic EXL</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->CivEXL</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Wednesday, February 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">4.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Fun to drive and fuel efficient car. CVT numbs the driving a lot but is a trade off for the increased fuel economy. Seating is decent, but could definitely use some more lumbar support to make it better.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Poor Man&#x27;s Bugatti</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Greg</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Sunday, January 01, 2023</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">5.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>Got the 2022 Honda Civic EX-L.  Added back spoiler, side molding, custom car seat covers, leather steering wheel cover, tinted windows, and window visors. The car looks fantastic, has 180 horsepower, and gets excellent gas mileage.  At the end of the day, only time will tell how reliable it turns out to be, but with regular maintenance, I expect the car to last a long time. The car feels a lot more expensive than it is and the ride is smooth. I have no complaints at all about it. If anything, I think it has too many so-called safety features, most of which I disable. I hate lane assist because it feels like the car is fighting me when I go to change lanes. Also, I don&#x27;t like the Auto Idle Stop, but there is a button to easily disable it.</span><span style=""position:fixed;visibility:hidden;top:0;left:0""><span>…<!-- --> <button class=""read-more-link text-link d-block"" type=""button"">Read More</button></span></span></span></div></li><li class=""border-bottom py-4""><div class=""kbb-review-item d-flex""><div class=""kbb-review-heading-container""><h4 class=""kbb-review-heading font-weight-bold text-capitalize m-0"">Dashboard rattles!</h4><p class=""text-muted""><span><span class=""kbb-review-name"">By <!-- -->Jeff</span><span class=""text-muted separator"" aria-hidden=""true""> | </span><span class=""sr-only""> <!-- -->on<!-- --> </span></span><span class=""kbb-review-submission-date"">Saturday, September 24, 2022</span></p></div><strong class=""kbb-review-rating ml-auto font-weight-bold ddc-font-size-xlarge"">1.0</strong></div><div class=""review-body""><span><span></span><span>I bought this civic lx 2022 four months ago. Now I can hear annoying rattling sound almost from every parts of the dashboard, which is driving me crazy. // Publish instantEprice to DR3/Accelerate iframe
document.addEventListener(""DOMContentLoaded"", function() {
if (window.DDC && window.DDC.pubsub && window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe) {
window.DDC.pubsub.subscribe('instant-eprice.show', function (data) {
if (data.yourEPrice !== 'PLEASE_CALL') {
var re = new RegExp('^(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:[^@\n]+@)?(?:www\.)?([^:\/\n]+)');
var mmdFrame = document.getElementById('mmd-frame-frame2');
// null check
if (mmdFrame && mmdFrame.src && mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]) {
mmdFrame.contentWindow.postMessage({""eprice"": Number(data.yourEPrice.replace(/[^0-9\.]+/g,""""))}, mmdFrame.src.match(re)[0]);
}
}
});
}
});
</script>

for (var property in obj) {
if (obj.hasOwnProperty(property)) {
var val = obj[property];
if (typeof val === ""object"") {
stripNullStrings(val);
} else {

var generateCallTrackingSessionId = function() {
var uuid = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2) + (new Date()).getTime().toString(36);
return uuid;
},
setCallTrackingSessionCookie = function(uuid) {
// Set cookie to expire in 2 hours
var expirationTime = new Date();
expirationTime.setTime(expirationTime.getTime() + 120 * 60 * 1000);
document.cookie = 'callTrackingSessionId=' + uuid + ';expires=' + expirationTime.toGMTString() + ';path=/';
},
cookieRxResults = new RegExp(""callTrackingSessionId=\(\.\*\?\)\(;\|\$\)"").exec(document.cookie),
callTrackingSessionId
;
if (cookieRxResults) {
callTrackingSessionId = cookieRxResults[1];
} else {
callTrackingSessionId = generateCallTrackingSessionId();
setCallTrackingSessionCookie(callTrackingSessionId);
}
window.DDC.callTrackingSettings = {
callTrackingArtifactBaseUrl: 'https://phones.ddcplatform.dealer.com',
callTrackingSessionId: callTrackingSessionId,
callTrackingAccountIdsOverride: null
};
window.DDC.phonesUrl = 'https://phone-swapping-service-prod.us-west-2.web.dealer.com:443/phones';

<script type=""text/javascript"">
if (typeof perfMetrics === ""object"") {
perfMetrics.onFirstInputDelay(function(delay, evt) {
if (!window.newrelic) { return; }
window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('firstInputDelay', Math.round(delay));
window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('firstInputType', evt.type);
if (evt.isTrusted !== undefined) { window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('firstInputTrusted', evt.isTrusted.toString()); }
if (evt.timeStamp !== undefined) { window.newrelic.setCustomAttribute('firstInputTimestamp', Math.round(evt.timeStamp)); }
});
}
$(document).ready(function() {
var newrelic = window.newrelic;
if (typeof newrelic === 'object') {
var cacheStatus = 'UNKNOWN';
try {
var cdnCache;
var navEntries = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation');
if (navEntries.length > 0) {
if (navEntries[0].serverTiming) {
cdnCache = navEntries[0].serverTiming.find(entry => entry.name === 'cdn-cache');
if (cdnCache !== undefined) {
cacheStatus = cdnCache.description;
}
} else {
cacheStatus = 'UNSUPPORTED';
}
}
} catch (error) {
cacheStatus = 'ERROR';
console.error(error);
}
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('basePageCacheStatus', cacheStatus);
var pageHtml = document.documentElement.outerHTML;
var base64Regex = new RegExp(""src=\""data:image/.*;base64"");
var hasBase64Img = (base64Regex.test(pageHtml) ? 'true' : 'false');
var gaCookie = jQuery.cookie('_ga');
var gidCookie = jQuery.cookie('_gid');
var edmundsCookie = jQuery.cookie('_edwpv');
var abcCookie = jQuery.cookie('ddc_abc_cache');
var appnexusAdCookie = jQuery.cookie('ddc_abcamm_cache');
var cometAdCookie = jQuery.cookie('ddc_abcc_cache');
var googleAdCookie = jQuery.cookie('ddc_abcg_cache');
var akamaiBot = jQuery.cookie('ddc_akam_bot');
function getCookieValue(cookieName) {
return Cookies.get(cookieName);
}
function ddcSetCustomAttributeFromCookie(attrName, cookieName, removeCookie) {
var cookieValue = getCookieValue(cookieName);
if(cookieValue) {
newrelic.setCustomAttribute(attrName, cookieValue);
if(removeCookie) {
Cookies.remove(cookieName)
}
}
}
if (getCookieValue('ddc_diag_akam_fullPath') != null && window.location.pathname === '/sorry-assets/sorry.htm' && window.location.search === '?isAkamaiSorry=True') {
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('isAkamaiSorry', true);
}

ddcSetCustomAttributeFromCookie('rawUrl', 'ddc_diag_akam_fullPath', true);
ddcSetCustomAttributeFromCookie('requestID', 'ddc_diag_akam_requestID', true);

ddcSetCustomAttributeFromCookie('currentTime', 'ddc_diag_akam_currentTime', true);
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('pageSize', pageHtml.length);
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('base64Img', hasBase64Img);
var sendPageData = (Math.floor(Math.random() * Math.floor(100)) === 1);
if (sendPageData) {
if (DDC && DDC.dataLayer && DDC.dataLayer['page']) {
newrelic.setCustomAttribute('pageWidgets', DDC.dataLayer['page'].pageInfo.pageWidgets.toString());
}

}

} else if (jQuery.cookie('_ga_last') !== jQuery.cookie('_ga')) {

}
